name: Pumpkin Jump
description:
This 3D physics-based platformer takes you into the lair of the Lord Pumpkin, who has challenged you. Use your exploding pumpkins to bounce your way up Lord Pumpkin's tower and defeat it!

WebGL Version Available Here: Pumpkin Jump Web by TJRT (itch.io)
(Note: A couple of the shaders I wrote don't work properly in the WebGL version, so using the downloadable version is preferred)
